name: inversify-tracer
description: Tool that allows the developer to trace methods of objects created by InversifyJS
author: Tiago Fernandes

scripts.build: concurrently "npm run lint"  "npm run clean" && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:prod: npm install && tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json && npm prune --production
scripts.test: rimraf coverage && nyc npm run test:mocha
scripts.clean: rimraf src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.js src/**/*.js.map test/**/*.d.ts test/**/*.js test/**/*.js.map
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run clean-external && npm install && npm run build
